1.12.2.0.0.1: First release.  Dimensional rifts work hooked to config, items have tooltips.
1.12.2.0.0.2: Rifts allowed with no item in config, to disable all checks so anything goes.   Tooltip on items starts light grey, but gets orange or red if you are close.
1.12.2.0.0.3: Fixed tooltip log exception.  New config added to disable chat messages.
